name: Fall Game 3d Endless Adventure
description:
Do you enjoy playing durable running games,
Here, you will be attracted to a fun and challenging game. Help your character not fall in this fun arena.

Breakthrough doors, run past obstacles or give someone a blast. You get to choose the kind of guy you want to be. So are you ready?

GameModes

Arcade
pass levels unlock new journeys


Random Game Modes (Coming Soon)
PLAY Totally random game modes different rules for more FUN


Tournament Mode(Coming Soon)
Join Tournament pass hardest rounds earn achievements


GAME FEATURES:
- Simple and fun game
- Cool and fun colored environment.
- Easy controls
- Beautiful graphics
- Realistic&Fun Ragdooll physics
- lots of traps
- Improved Interface

As a new game, there are many things that are flawed. If you don't like or are not satisfied with something in this game, don't give a 1-star rating. Please give us a feedback for improvement to this email:extremegamingst01@gmail.com to make the game better, we really thank you for this! Have a good day.

EARLY ACCESS
Get to be a part of this journey by helping us with your Feedback and Suggestions. With more new modes and gameplay elements coming regularly, you get to shape the future of this game.
